data.name: Running Shadow - Treasure Hunter Suit
data.detailed_description:
- The Treasure Hunter suit will let you earn 10% more gold every time you complete a quest. This is an essential item for players who like the ring of coin.
- Upon purchasing suit, you will receive 10,000 bonus coins!
